page.title: 09OVER SIXTIES CLUB
page.content: Many older people join the Over 60's club sponsored by Age Concern, meeting twice monthly in the village hall,enjoying a pleasant afternoon with friends. Our Chairman and Committee plan entertainment,quiz,an interesting speaker, travel or holiday slides, competitions.Sometimes members provide entertainment.We have tea and a raffle too.In the final chorus we sing "No one need be alone".We have outings,theatre visits, birthday teas and special lunchions.The Age Concern Church Service in Petersfield is enjoyed yearly.Skilled members enter articles in the Handicraft Exhibition, often winning prizes or commendations. In these ways Grandmas and Grandpas join other Senior Citizens,everyone has something to contribute and all find much to enjoy together.
